channel.title: data_science on Drew Howell
channel.description: Recent content in data_science on Drew Howell

item.title: DS Section Nav
item.description: Here is a list of my data science articles in the order I would present them to someone who is unfamiliar with data science. Data Science Articles Data Literacy - discussing aspects of data and digital information in general Visualizing Data - how to convey quantitative information Clustering - reveal the inherent "cliques" of rows within your data set The K-means Algorithm - step-by-step visualizations of the algorithm at work Joining Data - methods for joining different data sets into one Bayesianism - why is Thomas Bayes such a big deal?
